/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and trucks, hinting at the city's active transportation. Buildings of different sizes and designs flank the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the greenery of the trees and grass providing a refreshing contrast to the urban landscape.
